title: Follow the Convoy
content:
ass or fail, you'll be able to summon Kar'niss the drider. Speak to him and tell him to guide you towards Moonrise Towers. Make sure you stay close to Kar'niss to protect yourself from the shadows, the lantern he is holding repels the dark forces around. As you follow the rider, you'll stop by an abandoned building where you'll be ambushed by Harpers.
